# Dental Clinical Management System - Development Instructions

## Project Overview
Professional dental clinical management system built with Next.js 14, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

## Progress Tracking
- [x] Create Next.js project workspace
- [ ] Set up project structure and dependencies
- [ ] Create authentication system and context
- [ ] Build API service layer
- [ ] Create reusable UI components
- [ ] Build authentication pages
- [ ] Create Dashboard layout
- [ ] Build feature pages

## Technical Stack
- Next.js 14 (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- React Context for state management
- JWT authentication

## API Integration
Base URL: https://localhost:7XXX
- Authentication: JWT Bearer tokens
- Roles: Doctor (full access), Nurse (limited access)
